entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 1:00 PM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 8.3°C
Wind: SE 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 30 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
